title: 毛泽东选集第一卷
author: 毛泽东
description: 《毛泽东选集》第一卷收录了毛泽东同志在中国新民主主义革命时期的重要著作。
descriptionEn: Selected Works of Mao Tse-tung Volume 1 contains important works by Comrade Mao Zedong during the period of China's new democratic revolution.

title: 毛泽东选集第二卷
author: 毛泽东
description: 《毛泽东选集》第二卷收录了毛泽东同志在抗日战争时期的重要著作。
descriptionEn: Selected Works of Mao Tse-tung Volume 2 contains important works by Comrade Mao Zedong during the War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression.

title: 毛泽东选集第三卷
author: 毛泽东
description: 《毛泽东选集》第三卷收录了毛泽东同志在抗日战争后期和解放战争时期的重要著作。
descriptionEn: Selected Works of Mao Tse-tung Volume 3 contains important works by Comrade Mao Zedong during the late period of the War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression and the War of Liberation.

title: 毛泽东选集第四卷
author: 毛泽东
description: 《毛泽东选集》第四卷收录了毛泽东同志在解放战争时期的重要著作。
descriptionEn: Selected Works of Mao Tse-tung Volume 4 contains important works by Comrade Mao Zedong during the War of Liberation.

title: 资本论第一卷
author: 卡尔·马克思
description: 《资本论》第一卷是马克思主义政治经济学的经典著作，揭示了资本主义社会的经济规律。
descriptionEn: Capital Volume 1 is a classic work of Marxist political economy that reveals the economic laws of capitalist society.

title: 资本论第二卷
author: 卡尔·马克思
description: 《资本论》第二卷分析了资本的流通过程和再生产过程。
descriptionEn: Capital Volume 2 analyzes the circulation process and reproduction process of capital.

title: 资本论第三卷
author: 卡尔·马克思
description: 《资本论》第三卷阐述了资本主义生产的总过程和剩余价值的分配。
descriptionEn: Capital Volume 3 expounds the general process of capitalist production and the distribution of surplus value.

title: 共产党宣言
author: 卡尔·马克思、弗里德里希·恩格斯
description: 《共产党宣言》是马克思主义诞生的标志，阐述了无产阶级的历史使命和共产主义的基本原理。
descriptionEn: The Communist Manifesto is the symbol of the birth of Marxism, expounding the historical mission of the proletariat and the basic principles of communism.

title: 列宁选集第一卷
author: 弗拉基米尔·伊里奇·列宁
description: 《列宁选集》第一卷收录了列宁在俄国革命时期的重要著作。
descriptionEn: Selected Works of Lenin Volume 1 contains important works by Lenin during the period of the Russian Revolution.

title: 列宁选集第二卷
author: 弗拉基米尔·伊里奇·列宁
description: 《列宁选集》第二卷收录了列宁在苏维埃政权初期的重要著作。
descriptionEn: Selected Works of Lenin Volume 2 contains important works by Lenin during the early period of Soviet power.
